info.title: GA4GH Discovery Search API
info.description:
Search is an API for searching biomedical data.
More information on:
- [GitHub Pages](../)
- [Full Discovery Search Specification](../SEARCHSPEC.html)
---
# Overview
The primary container for data in the Search API is the **Table**. Tables contain rows of data, where each row is a JSON object with key/value pairs. The table describes the structure of its row objects using [JSON Schema](https://json-schema.org/). Row attributes can take on any legal JSON value, eg. numbers, strings, booleans, nulls, arrays, and nested JSON objects.
The API supports browsing and discovery of data models and table metadata, listing table data, and optionally querying table data using arbitrarily complex expressions including joins and aggregations. The query language is SQL with domain specific functions to facilitate informative typing of the result fields.

tags.description: The Discovery and Browsing part of the Search API consists of the following REST operations. Concrete examples can be found [here](../SEARCHSPEC#discovery-and-browsing-examples).
tags.name: Discovery and Browsing

tags.description:
The Query API allows SQL execution through a REST API.
You can find some examples requests [here](../SEARCHSPEC#query-example).
tags.name: Query

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of tables available from this Search API instance.
Returns the information about the Table identified by name.

parameters.name: table_name
parameters.description: Retrieve the data model associated with the given table

404.description: This server does not implement the data operation

get.description: Optional operation that returns data from a Table.

parameters.name: table_name
parameters.description: Retrieve the data model and data rows (paginated) from the given table

404.description: This server does not implement the data operation

post.description: Optional operation that accepts a Query and returns a TableData. The result is returned in the same data structure as tables are returned by the discovery and browsing part of the Search API: a TableData object.

404.description: This server does not implement the search operation

Table.description: Describes a Table hosted by this search node.

next_page_url.description: URL pointing to the next page of the same Table. Null or absent on last page.

data.description: Page of JSON values, each adhering to the schema given in the "data_model" property

TableData.description: A paginated collection of tabular data
